bwwExcerpt: Start spreadin' the news... there's a new Phantom on Broadway",       "datePublished":"2024-01-13T07:25:07-05:00",         "articleBody": "But the real star of the show is Susan Stroman, whose blockbuster direction and choreography make up for the relatively lackluster songs. Beowulf Boritt's lush, imaginative scenic design at times threatens to eclipse the performers, but they're usually up for the challenge.
